content.html: December 1990 "Hello...(sob)...could you tell me when...(sob)...the next train from Bristol to Merthyr Tydfil is?" "Tom? Are you ok?" "Martin? I'm sorry...I meant to call the Bristol station..." "It's ok, I can look it up for you. Just hold on." "Thanks Martin" 7/12
content.value:
December 1990
"Hello...(sob)...could you tell me when...(sob)...the next train from Bristol to Merthyr Tydfil is?"
"Tom? Are you ok?"
"Martin? I'm sorry...I meant to call the Bristol station..."
"It's ok, I can look it up for you. Just hold on."
"Thanks Martin"
7/12
